report.title: DGfM filterable occurrences list
report.description: Based on Occurrences Download (with standard filters). Allows DGfM to see occurrences on a grid specific to their requirements, will probably also be used for downloads going forward.
report.query: SELECT #columns# FROM cache_occurrences_functional o JOIN cache_occurrences_nonfunctional onf on onf.id=o.id JOIN cache_samples_nonfunctional snf on snf.id=o.sample_id JOIN cache_taxa_taxon_lists cttl on cttl.id=o.taxa_taxon_list_id JOIN users u ON u.id=o.created_by_id JOIN people p ON p.id=u.person_id #agreements_join# #joins# WHERE #sharing_filter# AND (#ownData#=1 OR o.record_status not in ('D','R')) #idlist#

param.name: currentUser
param.description: Current user's warehouse ID. Allows a column to be output indicating that the user owns the record.

param.name: smpattrs
param.description: Comma separated list of sample attribute IDs to include

param.name: occattrs
param.description: Comma separated list of occurrence attribute IDs to include

param.name: uploadFolder
param.description: Image upload folder on the warehouse including the trailing slash

param.name: warehouse_id
param.description: Unique identifier code for the warehouse which can be prepended to occurrence IDs to make a globally unique record key

column.name: sample_id
column.sql: case when onf.sensitivity_precision is null then o.sample_id else null end

column.name: location_name
column.sql: case when onf.sensitivity_precision is null and onf.privacy_precision is null then o.location_name else 'Sensitive. Lat long is approximate.' end

column.name: determiner
column.sql: CASE WHEN onf.attr_det_full_name IS NULL THEN CASE WHEN onf.attr_det_last_name IS NULL THEN NULL ELSE onf.attr_det_last_name || COALESCE(', ' || onf.attr_det_first_name, '') END ELSE onf.attr_det_full_name END

column.name: images
column.sql: case when onf.media is null then null else '#uploadFolder#' || replace(onf.media, ',', ', #uploadFolder#') end
